alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:56PM CDT until June 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOX BUTTE COUNTY... At 353 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Berea, or near Alliance, moving southeast at 55 mph. At 342 PM MDT, trained spotters reported wind gusts of 60 mph in Hemingford. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Additional damage from wind drived hail is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Berea and Alliance Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for hail, damaging winds, and wind driven hail. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
